content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'te' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE dbo.te
	(
	 C1 nvarchar(30),
	 C2 nvarchar(30),
	 C3 nvarchar(30),
	 C4 nvarchar(30)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_te
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.te
(C1 1, C2 2, C3 3, C4 4)
FROM 'https://datalake099.dfs.core.windows.net/input/country.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://datalake099.dfs.core.windows.net/input/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM te
GO
